hero.title: Build better learning with ANATALEB
hero.subtitle: An Arabic‑first, AI‑driven platform that helps institutions manage learning, teachers run classes, students succeed, and parents stay informed — built to work fast even on slow internet.
hero.b1: Arabic + English with full RTL support
hero.b2: AI personalization and analytics by default
hero.b3: Multi‑role access: Admin, Institution, Teacher, Student, Parent
hero.b4: Lightweight, resilient design for low bandwidth

partners.text: Trusted and inspired by educators and NGOs working in fragile contexts

features.title: Everything you need to teach, learn, and manage at scale
features.kicker: Purpose‑built for schools and centers in fragile regions

institutions.title: Institutions
institutions.desc: Enrollments, sections, attendance, policies, term setup, and deep analytics.

teachers.title: Teachers

students.title: Students

parents.title: Parents
parents.desc: Private updates, attendance alerts, homework view, and achievement badges.
